title: A New Skin Idea For Yasuo
body: Have thought of this idea since Yasuo came on the scene as he reminds of the anime series BLEACH, so i thought a Soul Reaper inspired Skin would be amazing for Yas ??!!? Had to get it out there!

replies.body: sounds interesting you should try sketching this skin idea and pitching it to riot
Soul Reaver Yasuo would be ok.
